featureFlags.label: Patient flags
featureFlags.description: Visual components that enable healthcare providers to see relevant patient information with a glance in the Patient chart. Flags are displayed in the Patient Summary, just below the patient banner, and can link users to other areas of the chart to perform relevant actions during a visit.

feature.label: Ward App Patient Service
feature.description: This module, if installed, provides services for managing patients admitted to the ward.

featureFlags.description: Features to support printing a patient identifier sticker
featureFlags.label: Print patient identifier sticker

feature.label: EMR API Module
feature.description: This module, if installed, provides core EMR business logic.

featureFlags.description: Features to enter data for past visits. Includes the 'Edit Past Visit' button in the start visit dialog, and the 'Add Past Visit' button in the patient header
featureFlags.label: Retrospective Data Entry

featureFlags.description: When enabled, encounter summaries will display the full form layout instead of a simple observation list.
featureFlags.label: Enable Embedded Form View
